name: realML.localgraphclustering.graph.ncp
description: Network Community Profile for all connected components of the graph. For details please refer to: Jure Leskovec, Kevin J Lang, Anirban Dasgupta, Michael W Mahoney. Community structure in large networks: Natural cluster sizes and the absence of large well-defined clusters. The NCP is computed for each connected component of the given graph.

parameters.name: ratio
parameters.description: Ratio of nodes to be used for computation of NCP. It should be between 0 and 1.

parameters.name: algorithm
parameters.description: Algorithm for spectral local graph clustering. Options: 'fista', 'ista', 'acl'.

parameters.name: epsilon
parameters.description: Termination tolerance for l1-regularized PageRank, i.e., applies to all algorithms.

parameters.name: max_iter
parameters.description: Maximum number of iterations of FISTA, ISTA or ACL.

parameters.name: max_time_ncp
parameters.description: Maximum time in seconds for NCP calculation.

parameters.name: max_time_algorithm
parameters.description: Maximum time in seconds for each algorithm run during the NCP calculation.

parameters.name: cpp
parameters.description: Use the faster C++ version of FISTA or not.
